April 11, 2025 - The Hoosier logo is colored after Newton's race car at the time which was purple. The founder of Hoosier Racing Tire, Robert Newton, died in 2012, aged 85, at his home in Lakeville, Indiana. His wife and co–founder, Joyce Newton, died aged 85 on January 16, 2018. Continental Tire produces most motorsport–related tires at the Plymouth, Indiana tire plant, carrying the Hoosier, Continental, and General Tire tire brands...
